alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:51PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade and eastern Lawrence Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tilford, or 8 miles southeast of Sturgis, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Summerset around 255 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 33 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
